ygData.subject: Re: Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: The simulated hologram laughs somewhat. Bamphomet sim thing: Well if you dont bother to come back you will either explode or have chaochitan energy inserted

The simulated hologram laughs somewhat.

Bamphomet sim thing: "Well if you dont bother to come back you will 
either explode or have chaochitan energy inserted into your spark to 
extinguish it. And if you win the IGL, you still shall return here. 
Also note if you will that if anyone tries to tamper with your body, 
it will explode with chaochitan energy, destroying your body and 
spark at once."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Blacknightmare:
> 
> "Failsafes? what sort of Failsafes?"said Blacknightmare"what will 
> happen if I win the IGL?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> 
> 
> > The Bamphomet simulation thing stood there silent for a few 
moments 
> > as data of the IGL from the various Infecticons on the planet 
> entered 
> > its mind. 
> > 
> > Bamphomet Sim thing: "The IGL... hmmm the program will allow you 
to 
> > take part in the tournament. However upon your elimination you 
will 
> > return here for your sentence to be completed. Failsafes shall be 
> > installed into your system to make sure you do not think of 
running 
> > after you have been eliminated from the tournament."
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Blacknightmare::
> > > 
> > > Blacknightmare continue fightting agaisnt his enemie (Sorry 
I've 
> > > forget his name)"At last if this was the IGL"said the 
femme"this 
> > will 
> > > be a great battle..."
